attributes.action: Increase mileage allowance for NHS Community staff and stop capping it
attributes.background: To raise the mileage reimbursement for NHS staff working in community who have to use their own (or private) vehicles to care for their patients.  Also to take away the mileage reimbursement cap after reaching a certain amount of miles per year.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

Decisions relating to rates of reimbursement for costs incurred by staff who use private vehicles on NHS business is an operational matter for the NHS, not the UK Government or Parliament.
